reviewText: This was an o.k. movie in the 60's.  Very bad acting.  I know these girls weren't hired for their acting, but they good have put a little more life into their roles.

After seeing this film it will spoil all other movies you ever watch again,nothing can even come close to this. Crystal clear quality image from the original master takes you right into 1971 again and all its surreal glory. Dozens of films copied this movie but none dared go so far. Bart and Momo kidnap five girls including Uschi Digart and Peggy Church. Peggy is beyond cute in this one,the Susan Dey of porn she is incredible and very young in this. This could not have played theaters in this uncut version i know it had to be heavilly edited for people to avoid arrest in 1971 playing this in there theaters. The radiator scene where Peggy is steamed open because she is "not hot enough down there" is shocking. Bart has his way with each of them and commands there every move and action as these are his personal sex slaves. The girls trick Momo and jump him,now they find sleeping Bart and its the most fun ending ever in film history as the girls "revenge" is death by sex making Bart pay for his deeds. Get this one at all costs,see this at least once in your lifetime.
